p: Regarding group 2 Abs, prototype human mAb CR8020 binds a different epitope from that of CR6261/F10. Although the epitope is also on the HA stem, it is closer to the virus membrane. This antibody uses both heavy and light chains to make contact with its epitope, and the fusion peptide accounts for 50% of the Van der Waals forces involved in the Fab-HA binding ( 50).
